DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSectionPositions
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of distance expressions in sequentially increasing order paired with CrossSections, indicating the position of the corresponding section along the Directrix.

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSections
DocAttribute.Documentation: List of cross sections in sequential order along the Directrix

DocAttribute.Name: FixedAxisVertical
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indicates whether Sections are oriented with the Y axis of each profile facing upwards in +Z direction (True), or vertically perpendicular to the Directrix varying according to slope (False)
